title: What is wrong with the app
text: Hi so when I’m using google it always shows recent pages but when it’s on a recent page that looks different from the other one it goes back and forth on what recent page goes one had the x so you can delete it but the other one had you swiping it up so you can delete it like that when I’m using google the recent pages always changes and never stays the same it goes back and forth on what the recent page looks like and this is a problem for me cause most of the time it deletes my tabs

title: Garbage browser
text: What is the point of this app? Yes it’s Google search, but it needs to work as a browser when you actually click on a search result. Duh. But it is the worst browser I have ever used! Press the back button when you’ve been navigating click by click and page by page on a website, and what should happen? Any reasonable person reading this just said, “why, when you press the back button, you should be returned to the page you last viewed.” Yes, I agree. This app doesn’t, though. Nope, press the back button, and it skips over everything you’ve done for twenty minutes and takes you back to the original google search. What a joke.

title: Browser bar downgrade
text:
Previously, the tab had been updated to where you were not able to change or type in the browser at all once you searched something. Leaving you no choice but to close that tab and open a brand new one to find something else. It was terrible for me, but another update came out to return the tab back to the original ‘tap browser’ and change it to your liking. Yet again for some reason google decided to return that inconvenient tab setting. 
I downloaded Google for a reason, if I wanted another Safari I wouldn’t have downloaded Google.

title: terrible new front page
text: There used to be an option to exclude trending topics from the main page of the app, but it seems that’s been done away with. Now every time I open the app, I’m immediately confronted with some overblown, sensationalized news item or inane celebrity diet. And of course these links pop up exactly where the search bar used to be, so the instinct is still to tap there to use the app as usual. I’ve searched through the settings to find a way to change it back, but there doesn’t seem to be one (not anything obvious, anyway). It seems like google’s sold ad space on their front page. So I deleted the app. It was annoying enough, too many times a day. Yikes.

title: Loving my Google.
text:
How did you find us?  New clients would say, from Google. Google has brought our historical venue, Broadway Studios and Fame Venue hundreds of clients from all over the world for corporate and special events.  

Google has provided us information which I consider the most educational and entertaining tools for everyone’s advancement and  added knowledge. 

Also, if I need to know anything like a food recipe, or a person of interest or go any where just Google it.  Proudly, I attribute my big success to Google. Thank you so much.

title: Great before, now useless
text: This is a great app that I use almost everyday. It is very efficient and organized. One problem with the new update is painfully annoying however. Before, when the search bar was open, you could easily click on view all to see your search history. You could simply delete unimportant searches by swiping on them. Now, when you open your history, it has larger blacks showing searches, websites you visited (even if you didn't search for it) etc. You have to click THREE buttons to delete a single piece. It is incredulously annoying and basically a deal breaker. Google, please fix this immediately. I need to be able to see my history because I keep track of things there

title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE
text: I LOVED this app. This was my go-to over safari over everything. I read the news on the cards, searched everything you could think of, watched videos. My life was on here. Then the update. The news cards don’t update with new stories. They just constantly tell me “we will add new stories when the time is right”. How pretentious of you pricks. When I do get a story its crap I don’t read. Sports crap and when I try to delete it to get a new card it BRINGS IT RIGHT BACK. The touch doesn’t respond anymore either. Jumps all around and does whatever it wants. Can’t save pictures to use as screen savers anymore unless I want to go directly to the site without any choice. DELETING THIS GARBAGE and going to either download bing or use built in safari. DUNZO.

title: Google Always Comes Through.
text: No matter where I am, what device I’m using, or what the default browser is... I always make sure that I’m browsing on Google.  From its first days, Google has been my browser of choice.  It covers all bases as far as my personal needs are concerned, and always gives fast, accurate and superior results.  Aside from its multitude of features, it presents my search results in easy to “digest” and use visual format .   It always makes surfing the web a pleasurable experience.

title: Google is a Verb Too -
text:
I am a complete Google Geek... honestly, I have learned so much from “Googling” or “Googlizing” - word definitions & origins, history, scientific discoveries, celebrity nonsense, etc.  
- My family & friends make fun of me, because regardless of the question- if nobody can come up with an answer, my response is always “GoogleIt” yep 1 word.  So now they must all mock and respond in kind while putting goofy emphasis on the wrong syllable, oh yes and exaggerated facial expressions are a must too!  - They’re all just jealous of my extreme love for “The Google” - Admittedly, I am a Google addict.

title: Song Search Not Working On IOS 17
text:
Only reason i downloaded this (EXTRA) app and widget was to use the song search using my voice (hum) because it wasnt working on chrome nor giving me an option for it on iphone 15, and even after downloading this and applying the widget it still gave no option or no way to voice search it saying “what song is this”, instead it searched “what song is this” then lead me to a forum saying to download the app and widget. Pointless app. 
Just use shazam if you wanna know a song, google isnt updated to the new phones or iphones in general apparently at the moment. Ill stick to just using chrome and gmail. Dont download if your looking to search a song.

title: Collected Items disappear
text: My main issue I have with this app is my favorite pages constantly disappearing. I could mark a page that I would like to come back to later and I go into the little bookmarks or “collections” tab, and it’s not there. It’s annoying especially when I save articles I want to read later or pages I visit frequently only to open up my collections and be greeted with a “your collected items appear here” message. Yeah I know where they’re supposed to appear. I would just like them to actually be there when I look.

title: What’s going on with the Google app?
text: I’ve had the Google app installed on this phone and several others and have never really had a problem with this app up until now. It was my go-to app for searches, trending news, etc. but as of yesterday while browsing through the homepage with my newsfeed it’ll just crash and kick me out. Not sure what has changed but it’s been doing this since yesterday and still is. I’ve even shut down and restarted my phone thinking this would help but it didn’t. I am currently using the iPhone 11 with automatic updates and I see that this app was last updated a few days ago. Perhaps the new update has caused a glitch?

title: Google is not working
text: I love the app it’s a nice app but all of a sudden it stop working and when ever I tried to get on the app it shut off back to my screen on my phone I didn’t know what to do bc it kept doing it so I deleted the app google and it said in the App Store that it is for iOS phone or something and the download button is not blue it won’t let me download google hopefully you guys will put it back bc I don’t know what happens know I have to google Crome but it happened with google chrome too so idk what to do.

title: Discovery is as bad as it can be
text:
The google app has two main features:
• Google search: this is redundant with the search available in browser apps
• Discovery: a selection of news stories and web content supposedly tuned to the user’s interest. 

I won’t comment on Google search because it is the same basic search tool that I usually use from the browser. As the browser app has an important additional function the Google search app would be plain redundant it it was only for the search feature. 

Discovery has stopped working and this is the point where I am deleting the app. Before that, Discovery used to select cards that were mostly irrelevant to my interests (e.g. game of throne, celebrities, football and other very mainstream topics that are thrown into everyone’s face all the time from pretty much anywhere). Even though each card has a more/less switch to tune Discovery to an adequate selection of cards, it really doesn’t work at all and that’s to the point of being infuriating: clicking “less” makes the card vanish but only until the next refresh.

title: The best people you could ever ask for:
text:
Amboy Korling of Korling Construction and Habitat for Humanity put a roll-in shower for me. I have neuropathy and am confined to a wheelchair 100%
of the time. Habitat for Humanity put me in a hotel for my safety for 2 weeks. Amboy called me after eight days to say he was finished and that I could come home. (10 days early) The shower and spare bathroom for guests is WONDERFUL! I can't thank them enough!
You would be extremely happy hiring Korling Comstruction.
They are wonderful people and do
great work!  Evelyn Boyle of Santa Barbara

title: Google Default Apps won’t let me choose other apps
text: This is so frustrating. I used to love the Google search app but this problem is so infuriating. The app used to let me choose other apps as the default for opening links, maps for example. I had it set to Apple Maps as default when opening location. Then all of a sudden it switched to Google Maps without my knowing and it won’t let me switch back. I know exactly where to go in settings but the Default Apps setting just shows me “Featured Apps” and “Recommended Apps” all of which are Google. I don’t even see other options to change anything because that is all it will allow me to see. Please Google FIX THIS.

title: Please read!!!
text: I know that you spent time just for making Google but it's worth it. I gave this app 4 stars since the "update" came. I've got some problems with the update. Like for example, you search for an image on Google and you go to "Images" whenever you click on the photo, it's so different. Please bring back the old one like whenever you click on a photo you want, you can save it. But now, I've got some problems with the "saving" thing and I don't know anymore how to save a photo. But Google helps me with my homework so I'm glad of that.

title: Lens is amazing!
text: The new google lens feature blows my mind! When I first saw the feature, I expected it to be extremely work in progress, as it was machine learning based. When I saw how well the feature worked, I was amazed! The fact that google released the feature fully operational (instead of as an experimental feature) is amazing! Even when the lighting is dark, lens still works (at least from my experience) The only thing weird I experienced was when it thought a suitcase was a purse XD!

title: Great app. Staple for any device.
text:
One feature I wish was in the app was the 'open in News' button in the share menu. I'm not sure if Apple controls the shortcut for it and keeps it in Safari, or if Google has the ability to add the shortcut. Google sometimes recommends stories that I don't see in the News app recommendations. The News app is much less cluttered to read (also no annoying ads or crappy mobile site design).

Or, Google could make the UI from the feed much less cluttered and make a serious preference for AMP webpages shown in the feed.

title: Share button(Safari) in the wrong place…
text: I had to backup my iPhone, and start over. That meant that any app that needed to be updated, got updated. Including Google Search. The problem is when you search for something at first the share button is at the bottom(like it always has, and very convenient location. But when you go to that page or website, the share is located on the top right(sooo inconvenient). Why?? What’s next, the keyboard is going to be located at the top of everyone’s smartphone?? With all the updates, the smartphone isn’t what it used to be, when things were properly placed to be easier on your fingers(or thumbs). It’s Duck Duck Go. Google deleted.

title: Terrible updates
text: I used to really like this app and I liked it way more than Safari but the past updates have made this app so annoying to use. You used to be able to download images from search, but now you have to go onto the website the image is from to use it. When you open a tab now, it gives you this weird looking search window thing??? It doesn't reach the top of the screen which isn’t nice to look at and makes everything look really cramped. Also you cannot edit the url or search anything else without opening a new tab. I don’t think these changes were necessary at all and are just making the app bad.

title: Sport Score Notifications not working
text:
I don’t receive notifications about sports scores. iOS 15.5. iPhone 12. Yes, system notifications are on. Yes, it shows that I am following the team and the notification bell for the game is on. Yes, silent switch is off. Yes, I re-downloaded app. 
When a score is made….silence. Nothing. How can every sports app never fail at sending score notifications but somehow Google struggles with this task? Maybe they need to fire their current engineers and hire the ones on the other apps. If there’s any other info you need to solve the problem, then give me some of those ad dollars. Otherwise, my eyes pay you to figure it out. I’ve notified you, that’s all you’re getting.

title: I love it
text: It is really good it does not lag you can literally search whatever you want it gives you choices if you want to do videos or pictures I’m like it’s really I recommend it if you really like look at you like a mysterious person and you want to know a lot and like you’re like we’re like you really need to know this one thing at school you go to search it up and get the answer it’s really good whoever made it thank you I really recommend it

title: Great! Just one issue...
text: Google has worked perfectly for as long as I've had the app. Only recently, however, I am experiencing interruptions anytime I visit a website. I can only be on the site a few seconds before the screen goes blank and it says "webpage cannot be found". If I reload the screen a few times, it goes back to normal, only to display the same annoying message AGAIN and again. This is especially obnoxious when I am trying to watch an online movie or researching for school. Fix this problem please :/

title: I agree with johannesien—WAY TOO LIBERAL.
text:
I couldn’t agree more.  I do specific searches, say for Trump, and am shown options of images and articles that are BLATANTLY leftist...C’mon, Google, you were flawless and impressive not long ago, but this liberal slant (massive UNDERstatement) is so obvious, that the you’re still the talk-of-the-town amongst many, many years people, but the talk is often ugly.

Why can’t you just return to making really awesome things, and stop trying to subversively affect the thinking of those who aren’t aware of your surreptitious attempts to influence people’s political views...(Most) people aren’t the cretins you appear to believe they are, so bring us back the old, awesome, non-political Google!!  We miss it!

title: Bad News
text: Ya, I can still get to the search bar pretty quickly worth this app, but there are several entry points there. One main reason I originally added this app in a prominent place to my home screen is the well-sorted and relevant news items. This feature has gotten worse and worse and worse. It’s now a doom scrolling collection of the same 5 articles that have little to absolutely no interest or impact to me. I no longer can rate these articles or say “don’t show this again”. Now, Hide is still available but I scroll a few pixels and see the same thing again or open the app later to see what I hid earlier now as the first item. I wonder how the Bing app is?

title: Absolutely Mindblowing
text: I used to use Google a lot and then I stopped because safari was the default browser and therefore it was much more compatible. But recently I downloaded Google again and the abilities it has as a browser are unmatched. And with the constant update I find google not only repairs bugs but they add new features often. Overall 5 stars for sure I couldn’t think of anything else I’d need from a browser. :)

title: Get google chrome instead
text:
This app is so slow to the point to where it’s unusable, especially on boot. The user feedback is terrible as well; I press the back and forward arrow buttons on the bottom of the screen and I can’t even tell if I clicked on them or not. It gets even worse considering after you actually do press the button, it takes forever to go to the previous page. When you press on the search bar, it stalls for a bit, and if you’re typing while it stalls, none of the letters register.
On the other hand, I’ve experienced hardly any problems using google chrome.

title: Bad Algorithms
text:
I do not know how many times I can tell the algorithms I am not interested in sports, or hip-hop, pop culture, drag queens, or everything else uninteresting for content the app relentlessly pushed on me. The app gives useless to me articles, I had expected it to listen to my tastes and wants. It did not at all. Which is surprising given that Google seems to pride itself in knowing its customers. I did not search these things. I did not engage these articles. I would use the in app article touch-click menus to hide the articles or say that I was uninterested in the content, but this gets tedious, time after time after time. 

It didn’t do what was expected or perform well after 6 months of almost daily use. So, I deleted it.

title: Review
text: One of the finest gentleman I have met here at the car dealership is Mr. Alex Steiner. He is several people compressed into one single genius. He has been extraordinarily helpful in allaying all of my concerns, solving all my technical problems, and answering quickly and efficiently a mountain of questions I had for him. I recommended any customer coming to this dealership in need of highly specialized experience in technology go directly to Alex. Truly a wonderful gentleman, very courteous, and I recommend the most highly.

title: Getting directions
text:
Well every time I search a place using google and want to get directions to that place it doesn’t give it to me through my iPhone map gps anymore. there’s no way of getting directions to a place through iPhone maps like it used to work. Very upset and frustrated because now I have to manually type in the address every time through my iPhone maps.

Update - map issue is still a problem and I guess they’re not going to fix it ever. Also since this new update, I can’t have the app opened past a certain time limit because now it completely backs out and closes on me within the minute I open the app.

title: Outstanding place in Cienfuegos Cuba
text:
Camilas hostal was the most beautiful peaceful place to stay, arrive to pure beauty. It was easy to find not far from center of Cienfuegos center and close to other attractions. The best of it all was being welcomed by Alejandro getting our accommodation, while explaining everything very thoroughly also very helpful with recommendations. Top it off with the restaurant, very delicious affordable prices, great beverages, outstanding service peaceful by the water. I highly recommend this stay at Camilas hostal in Cienfuegos, I must say a return. 

Jeanie

title: Temporarily Disappointed
text:
I LOVED Google App for News....
I used to have about 10-15 News Stories when I would open my Google App...it’s the only place I ever read News! Then I had the option of going to a 2nd page for more Stories... For almost 2 weeks now I have about 6 stories on the main page and none on the second-it tells me to try back. Makes me sad! 
Even though I didn’t care to read about video games (I had not found away to edit my News Feed if there was a way)-My News in the Google App has went to crap. What changed? Is there a fix? Or just use the Google News App? 
So sad.

title: Why won’t it work?
text: I really like google, except, I can’t get in it every time I look for it on my iPad, It says I have it, but when I look for it in Siri it says, ‘Sorry, I cannot find Google, What were you searching for anyway?’ I say whatever I wanted to, but it won’t work , it says ‘open’ so I try to open it, it completely ignores it, can you please fix this? May you please fix this, thank you, This isn’t supposed to be a negative review, I rated google 5 stars, but fix this please, thank you so much

title: I have an idea
text: Yes granted this app is perfect and it have everything we need but theres one flaw and that flaw is that why have a camera take a picture of words and translate then to diffrent language words when when the app can ALSO translate what people are saying in foreign videos? Because i do not want siri to translate what the video is saying next to siris mic , i watch foreign videos and i need to know what they’re saying, so google, i hope you’ll see this and find this idea useful sincerely-your user

title: My Fitbit Watch
text: I was very well satisfied with the way my Fitbit watch was until I allowed Google to take over and completely change the way my setup was. The old saying is, “If it Ain’t Broke then DON’T Fix It or Change It!!!” Seems as though Google is trying to control too much of everything which I have a problem with. Google maps has even gotten worse. Takes me to directions & places totally out of my way, SMH!🥺It also constantly add wrong places I’ve never been and I have to correct them manually myself.😤 Give me a break, will you??🥵

text:
Hello can you guys pls reply quickly (respectfully) :) I don’t know how to restore all my recent tabs from years ago from now (today) I was really getting frustrated because I lost all of my important tabs and I know I can click on one of my old tabs one at a time that’s annoying I want to restore multiple tabs at once (pls in the next update add this ) I’m pretty sure EVERYBODY needs this feature :)

title: Remnant Utilities, Pataskala, Ohio
text:
If you are in need of excavation services for a sewer line repair, look no further than this company.  They did a wonderful job for us.  The owner was so fair and understanding and saw to it that the job was done in a timely manner and completed in the best way possible.   The people who work for him are outstanding.  We had never seen such hard workers who took such pride in what they did.  We found them friendly, knowledgeable, and trustworthy.  Great job.  

Steve and Linda Butler - Westerville, Ohio

title: Frustrating experience
text: It’s a decent news app, but frustrating to use. If you browse the list of articles and decide to actually read one, when you come back it will sometimes jump back to the top and lose track of where you were. It will also decide to randomly refresh sometimes and lose your place again. This might be okay if it had new articles to show you, but it tends to try pushing the same stories at you for a surprisingly long time, long after I am ready for some new content.

title: Nothing beats Google (well, maybe Chrome)
text: Google is the gold standard in search engines. Everyone knows that. Why would anyone use something else? Safari? Why? It cuts off  25% of the screen on my iPad. Internet Explorer? Do they make that anymore? In some cases I do use Google Chrome. One of my news sites can only be accessed with Chrome. I’m finding it loads slowly and I got to tap the screen a bunch of times to make it work. I’ll stick with Google. Need to find something on the Internet? Google it.

title: Great Except a Photo Download Bug
text: I’ve always used the Google app and absolutely loved it. However, once I updated my phone to iOS 15 and did an update of the app, I began having issues with downloading photos. Each time I try to download an image, the box disappears the second I lift my finger after pressing down on the photo to trigger the download option. I don’t know why it started doing this, but it has made it near impossible to download pictures now. Would love to see this get fixed.

title: Safari is better
text: I liked it at first, but then it said “you must confirm your age, or your account will be deleted” so I was on that for like an hour trying to figure out how to do the flipping thing, then I just decided to delete my  account, went back to make another one “sorry we can’t do this right now due to an error” I don’t like this or it’s dumb website that never lets you do crap, do it if your over 13, but I’m flipping 12, and I feel I should be able to have a dumb account without it having to not get any access to crap for the surveillance thing, like just let me have my account that is MINE.

title: Impossible to save images now
text:
I use google to look up images to reference, but need to save them to zoom in more or save for later in case I can’t find the image later, but the new update has destroyed that, and screenshots don’t suffice because of other icons blocking the image and a lower quality. Now I have to open them in a browser which takes away a lot of the convenience.
I also wish reverse image search could be implemented for mobile devices. Constantly have to request the desktop site on safari just to do it from my phone, but that is more of a long time request. I just want the old way of saving images back.

title: Highly disappointed
text: I sold an item last night. I received notice from eBay that the item was paid for to ship now. I shipped first thing this morning like a good seller. I received notice this afternoon that eBay canceled the order due to safety concerns with the buyer. Now I’m out my item and shipping cost. I’ve spent two hours with four different people at eBay to try to find out who was reimbursing me for my item and shipping. They said to contact the buyer and ask them to ship it back. Lol the person they just told me was a . What a joke. I’m taking my business to mercari. I guess I’m just out my item and all costs of bubble wrap packaging and shipping cost not to mention my item. Shame on eBay

title: "Shake to send feedback"
text: Here's my feedback: how about you put an option in settings to turn this stupid feature off? Since the recent update, every time I move my hand while scrolling this stupid notification pops up at the bottom of my screen even though I have the shake feature disabled for all apps on my iPhone 11 Pro. So explain how your app has access to my precise movements when my phone doesn't. Think I need to report this up the chain. So sick and tired of tech companies taking liberties like this. Fellow users, if you can't see the potential implications from a feature work-around like this, you're the reason privacy is dead in this country.

title: It’s very good but..
text: Google is a very good app you can use it to search up stuff that you don’t know and learn something new. Though google has some private information about people like their family. Do you think that is a little creepy. My mom doesn’t want people being able to search up her name and read stuff about her. It be cool if you didn’t have that there. If they stole something and are in jail then you could put some stuff about him / her. All in all I don’t really like it that people can just randomly search you up

title: Love hate relationship!
text: I honestly have a hard time writing this review. The gmail app as while is great , very easy to use and has great features when it works. I often have to redownload or restart my phone in order to get my mail. I will often get a notification telling me I got a new email but when I go to the app it tell me I have no connection and the email won’t load. But if I had no connection how would I be able to get the notification. How would all of my other apps work just fine. When I restart my phone 9 out of 10 times I will then get my mail but it is short lived. Fix it!!!

title: Googling
text: I love to google things up. This app helps me to improve my knowledge and my learning on my interest of different topics. Also, if I wanna know anything of interest that comes to my mind. I find it very valuable when it comes to googling. When my husband has a question for me to answer and I can’t give him  answer. I always tell him to google it up. Now! His reply to me is the same. Which is hilarious! We both learn a lot from the google apps. I rate this app a 4.9 because nothing is perfect. Got be something else to google. Have fun with google. My baby girl!
